meanings.sent1: I wish I could unlive this moment.
meanings.sent2: When the plant dies, it unlives.
meanings.sent3: If I could unlive yesterday, I would.
meanings.sent4: The abandoned house seemed to unlive in the darkness.
meanings.sent5: The idea of unliving a memory is intriguing.

meanings.definition: To make life unbearable or impossible
meanings.sent1: The constant noise unlived the peaceful village.
meanings.sent2: Bullying can unlive a person's happiness.
meanings.sent3: The noisy parrot unliving the library was quite a sight.
meanings.sent4: The storm unlived the calm of the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The strict rules unlive the fun of the party.
